name: The Final Day of Green
description:
This is a 2D side scrolling platformer. You play as a forest spirit trying to stop the evil spread of machines.

The story is the player needs to cleanse the corruption before the days end otherwise the world ends. Whatever is giving the player their magical power to create life can also turn back time to the start of the day.

Goal

Reach the boss room by going to the right

Controls

Arrow keys or WASD to move

G to attack

Spacebar to Jump

Hold Space Bar while falling to slow fall.

ESC to pause the game.

Credits

Music & Sound Design: Poltergeisha

Game Designer: jangowolf

Coder: Burnstuff4567

Coder: Bananaphone

Artist: Lynn-Isle

3D modeler: Seabass

Behind the Scenes
